member.name: M:Funciones.Financieras.CountDays(System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.String)
member.summary: Count days between dates t1 and t2 accordingly to the day count convention Basis
member.param: Basis arguments are: "Act/360", "Act/365" and "30/360"

member.name: M:Funciones.Financieras.YearFraction(System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.String)
member.summary: Computes the fraction of year between dates t1 and t2 accordingly to the day count convention Basis
member.param: Fecha t1
Fecha t2
member.remarks: Valid Basis arguments are: Act/360, Act/365 and 30/360

member.name: M:Funciones.Financieras.AddMonths(System.DateTime,System.Int32)
member.summary: Equivalent to Excel Function EDATE() add/sustracts Mon number of months to date Dat for positive/negative values of Mon
member.param: Date
positive/negative values of Months

member.name: M:Funciones.Financieras.AddMonthsC(System.DateTime,System.Int32)
member.summary: equivalent to Excel Function EDATE() add/sustracts Mon number of months to date Dat for positive/negative values of Mon

member.name: M:Funciones.Financieras.calendar(System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.param: expressed in months, valid is integers from 1 to 12
0 is same, 1 is next buss day, else is next buss day
1 is next buss day, 2 is plus 2 buss days, else is next buss day,0 is same or next buss day if end date is not buss day
1 is at the beginning, 2 is at the end, else is at he end
member.remarks: Retorna una matriz de dobles con base cero

member.name: M:Funciones.Financieras.floatCalendar(System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.param: expressed in months, valid is integers from 1 to 12
0 is same, 1 is next buss day, else is next buss day
1 is next buss day, 2 is plus 2 buss days, else is next buss day
1 is at the beginning, 2 is at the end, else is at he end
is how many buss days before start date the index is fixed
corresponds to how many interest periods correspond to one fixing. 1 is one fixing per period 2 is one fixing per two periods
1 is at the beginning, 2 at the end, else is at the end

member.name: M:Funciones.Financieras.GenerarClave(System.String)
member.summary: Genera una clave del tipo xxxxxx-xxxxxx-xxxxxx-xxxxxx-xxxxxx-xxxxxx-xxxxxx-xxxxxx a partir de un string.
member.param: Clave a Encriptar
